extendedInfo.description: The Mercedes-Benz BlueEFFICIENCY battery saver app helps you extend your battery life. In exactly the same way that BlueEFFICIENCY saves fuel in Mercedes-Benz cars. Thanks to a user-friendly interface and innovative use of technology, we succeed in saving battery power without any noticeable impact on functionality. By applying the same principles in technical innovation, BlueEFFICIENCY easily racks up over an hour of extended battery life each day without any noticeable impact on functionality.With the BlueEFFICIENCY app, all the major battery-consuming components of the phone are automatically controlled in perfect sync with your needs, all packed in a slick, elegant interface that gives you full control. By intelligently limiting or disabling individual components when you donât need them, minutes are saved on every hour, which can stack up to an increase of 25% in battery life.Just a few of the intelligent features packed under the hood include making optimizations to Androidâs media scanner, ensuring that only relevant folders are searched when it crawls through media to generate thumbnails, add photos to the gallery and locate mp3s. The smart screen brightness feature applies the appropriate brightness tailored to different situations and our data synchronisation bundles pending activity and then syncs data with intervals.Despite all the knowledge built into the BlueEFFICIENCY app, the app is exceedingly simple to use. It comes with three battery-saving profiles and the ability to turn it off completely:â	Off - Disables all of BlueEFFICIENCYâs features for those times when you simply need full connectivity.â	Light - This applies basic savings across the most energy consuming components.â	Heavy -  This provides a more strict regimen of savings across all features with the added ability to tweak each setting to perfection.â	Emergency - For those times when you need every last bit of juice, this aptly named profile turns off all settings except for the basic phone network, functioning as a type of flight-mode while keeping the ability to make and receive calls and texts. This not only functions as the most battery saving setting possible, but doubles as a perfect travel mode to prevent roaming charges!To ensure the BlueEFFICIENCY battery saver app works to its full potential, we recommend not using multiple battery saving apps at the same time, such as Juice Defender or Easy Battery Saver, as they may conflict and prevent each other from doing their jobs.

reviews.title: Don\'t work so well on my phone may buy me a Mercedes tho.
reviews.comment: Filled with a few bugs. Disconnected my Bluetooth which irritated me quite a bit and disconnected my internet connection both of which had to be reconnected manually. Will try a lower setting and hope it doesn\'t bug me any further. I give it one extra star for the infomercial even tho it don\'t have the site in English till I find out if it can chime with my setting in my phone then I may up star it at a later time :)  Motorola Photon Q.
reviews.author: Thomas Perkins

reviews.title: Great..
reviews.comment: I Like The App Very Much!! And I Was Just Wondering If U Have Any Technology To Help Phones To Achieve More Battery Life?!

reviews.title: It really works!
reviews.comment: Ive used a lot of batterysaver! But this one is the best. My battery used to die in 12 hours. But this one help me. I\'m keeping this app.  Plus it doesn\'t slow my phone unlike other batterysaver! I highly recommend to everyone!,

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: This app combined with my phone\'s power saving mode saves a lot of juice. But the app doesnt count my minutes saved. Please fix this

reviews.comment: Awesome app it works with the minutes saved and stuff I always lyk Mercedes work keep it up and im sure u will improve the app better =\')

reviews.title: Slows down device
reviews.comment: Nice app but does not work on a Galaxy Note with Android 4.2 The device gets slowed down tremendously whilst the battery still runs out of power.

reviews.title: Wunderbar
reviews.comment: Next to driving a great car this app indeed is equally great in saving battery life of my S3. In my native tongue: super goede app!

reviews.title: Excellent Excellent Excellent
reviews.comment: It\'s very good & helps saving the battery and shows how much did it save and thats Fits me & it\'s \"free\".
reviews.author: Omar Aaziz

reviews.title: Multifunctional
reviews.comment: I usually want my wifi and mobile data to be enabled at all times, so I\'m using this app mostly for the auto brightness only; it\'s way more pleasant (and adjustable!) than the Android built-in auto brightness. Also, the mediascanner optimisation is something I haven\'t seen in other battery savers.
reviews.author: Mathijs Lagerberg

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Fantastic app.. And I really like it.. Saved ma battery use a lot.. N really efficient n effective...
